name: market for sawnwood, azobe, dried (u=15%), planed | sawnwood, azobe, dried (u=15%), planed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23195/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'sawnwood, azobe, dried (u=20%), planed', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The product 'sawnwood, azobe, dried (u=15%), planed' represents sawn azobe hardwood. The wood has been air dried to a water content (water in wet mass [kg] / dry mass [kg]) of 15 %.  Production takes place at a sawmill. Sawnwood is used as a construction material, for the production of wooden furniture, glued laminated timber, and wooden boards. 

Activity starts with the delivery of the product at the sawmill gate.

Activity ends with the product delivered to consumers.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood
